# Import dataset
```{r}
library(dplyr)

df <- read.csv("melbourne_housing.csv")
head(df, 10)
glimpse(df)
```

```{r}
df %>% summarize_all(n_distinct)
```

```{r}
df <- df %>% select(-c(Address, Suburb, Method, Postcode)) %>% na.omit(Price)
head(df, 10)
```

```{R}
ggplot(df, aes(x=Distance, y=Price)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method=lm, se=FALSE)

ggplot(df, aes(x=Propertycount, y=Price)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method=lm, se=FALSE)
```
```{R}
ggplot(df) + geom_bar(aes(x=Regionname, y=Price, fill=Regionname), stat="summary", fun=mean)+coord_flip()
```
